active_incidents.title: Some Enterprise Grid users are unable to retrieve channel lists when building workflows and webhooks

notes.body: Enterprise Grid users should no longer be experiencing any trouble using workflows or webhooks. Apologies for the trouble today and thank you for your patience.
We’re seeing signs of improvement, but we’re still monitoring the situation. We’ll confirm once the issue with workflows and webhooks is fully resolved or we have another update to share.
We’re still looking into the cause of the issue, and we’ll provide new information as soon as it’s available. Thanks for your continued patience.
We're continuing to investigate this issue, but we don't have any new information to share at this time. Thanks for your patience as we continue to work towards a fix
Our team is still investigating this issue and we will post another update once we have more information to share.
Some Enterprise Grid users have reported that they’re unable to set up workflows and webhooks as their channel list isn’t populating.
